import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Col, Row, Button, Form, InputGroup, DropdownButton, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { PencilSquare, Trash, PlusLg } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import '../style/ManageProduct.css' import { product } from '../data/product'; const ManageProduct = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('Code'); const [keyword, setKeyword] = useState(''); const handleTerm = (event) => { setSearchTerm(event.target.value); } const handleKeyword = () => { } return (

Manage Product

{product.map((item, idx) => (
{`id: ${item.id || idx}`}
{item.code} {item.title} {item.category} ))}
) } export default ManageProduct;
